name: SANOFI
memberOrga: Genzyme, Merial (until 31.12.2016), Sanofi-Pasteur and Zentiva are member companies of the Sanofi group which develop specific activities
goal:
Sanofi, a global healthcare leader, discovers, develops and distributes therapeutic solutions focused on patients' needs. Sanofi is organized into five global business units: Diabetes and Cardiovascular, General Medicines and Emerging Markets, Sanofi Genzyme, Sanofi Pasteur and
Consumer Healthcare.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
- EU/Canada Trade Agreement
- The EU-U.S. Transatlantic Trade and Investment Partnership (TTIP)
- Personal data Regulation
- Protection of animals used for scientific purposes Directive
- Medical Devices Regulation
- Activities and supervision of institutions for occupational retirement provision Directive (recast)
- Health Technology Assessment
- Antimicrobial Microbial Resistance Action Plan
- Reach
- Pharmaceuticals in the environment
- Innovative Medicines Initiative (IMI)
- EU Options for improving access to medicines
- The Single Market Strategy
- EU Competitiveness strategy
- EU Clinical trials regulation
- EU Research policy
